name: Miss Spicy Sichuan Kitchen (Inside The Avila Centre)
address: Address: 127 - 670 Reaume Street (Inside The Avila Centre)
text:
JIANBING CREPES 煎饼果子
Original Jianbing Crepes 煎饼果子 10.50

DESSERT CREPES 甜品可丽饼
Original Crepes 10.99

MANGO DRINKS 芒果饮品系列
Yunnan Paoluda 云南泡鲁达 10.99
A Yunnan specialty; sago, bread cubes, raisins,
cranberries, peanuts, and coconut milk, topped with
ice cream.

Mango Coconut Fresh Milk 生椰芒芒 8.99
A tropical blend of fresh mango puree, mango cubes,
coconut milk, and fresh milk, served over ice.

Mango Sago with Coconut Milk 芒果西米露 8.99
Drink with mango puree, fresh mango cubes, coconut
milk, and chewy sago pearls. Including Gelatin or Jelly.

YUNNAN ICED LEMON TEA 大杯柠檬茶
Yunnan Sticky Rice Lemon Green Tea L 5.99
大杯云南糯香柠檬绿茶
Refreshing lemon green tea brewed with premium
Yunnan sticky rice aroma tea

Yunnan High Aroma Lemon Black Tea L 大杯 5.99
云南高香柠檬红茶
Citrusy lemon black tea with rich Yunnan small-leaf
black tea fragrance

CLASSICAL BUBBLE TEA 经典珍珠奶茶
Classic Milk Tea 原味奶茶 6.99
Signature Pearl Milk Tea 招牌珍珠奶茶 7.99
Brown Sugar Pearl Milk Tea 黑糖珍珠奶茶 7.99

STEAMED DIM SUM (蒸制点心)
Shrimp Har Gow (6 Pieces) 虾饺皇 11.99
crystal shrimp dumpling with whole shrimp filling

Dim Sum Combo Platter 点心拼盘 (16 pieces) 18.99
Assorted steamed dim sum including Siu Mai,
Dumplings, and Shrimp Dumplings
